Wave.FifthPlayerJoined: {gold}!wave{default} A 6th player joined the server. Bot Waves disabled.
Wave.FifthPlayerJoinedThanks: {lime}Thanks for helping populate the server! Switched back to regular AWP gameplay.
Wave.Vote.Enable: {lime}{0}{default} wants Bot Waves enabled. ({1} of {2} votes needed)
Wave.Vote.Disable: {lime}{0}{default} wants Bot Waves disabled. ({1} of {2} votes needed)
Wave.Vote.UseWaveToStop: {gold}!wave{default} To stop wave mode, type {lime}!wave{default} or {lime}wave{default} in chat to cast your vote. ({0} of {1} votes needed)
Wave.ZombieEnabled: {gold}!wave{default} {green}EASY MODE!{default} Bots now only have knives!
Wave.ZombieEnabled.Center: EASY MODE - BOTS HAVE KNIVES ONLY
Wave.ZombieDisabled: {gold}!wave{default} Easy mode disabled. Bots have normal weapons.
Wave.ZombieDisabled.Center: EASY MODE DISABLED - BOTS HAVE GUNS
Wave.ZombieNeedWaveActive: {gold}!wave{default} Wave mode must be active to change difficulty. Use {lime}!wave{default} first!
Wave.InvalidDifficulty: {gold}!wave{default} Invalid difficulty. Use: easy, normal, or hard
Wave.Dif.NeedWaveActive: {gold}!dif{default} Wave mode must be active first! Type {lime}!wave{default} to start.
Wave.DifficultyReduced: {gold}!wave{default} Difficulty reduced! Wave {0} reduced from {1} to {2} bots ({3} removed)
Wave.SpawnLimitReached: {gold}!wave{default} Only {0} bots fit on map. {1} will re-spawn!
Wave.NoMoreRespawns: {gold}!wave{default} No more bot re-spawns! Kill the rest!
Wave.NoMoreRespawns.Center: NO MORE BOT RESPAWNS - KILL THEM ALL!
Bot.Removed: {gold}!bot{default} All bots removed. Want a bot? Type {lime}!bot{default}
Bot.Added: {gold}!bot{default} Bot quota set to 2. Remove bot? Type {lime}!bot{default}
Bot.CannotUseDuringWave: {gold}!bot{default} Can't toggle bots during wave mode!
